text: Ted 2 is a 2015 American comedy movie directed, produced and co-written by Seth MacFarlane. It is the sequel to the 2012 film Ted. Mark Wahlberg, MacFarlane and Giovanni Ribisi reprise their roles, while Amanda Seyfried and Morgan Freeman star in the movie. Filming began on July 28, 2014. It was released on June 26, 2015. == Cast == *Mark Wahlberg as John Bennett *Seth MacFarlane as Ted Clubberlang *Amanda Seyfried as Samantha Leslie "Sam L." Jackson *Giovanni Ribisi as Donny *Jessica Barth as Tami-Lynn Clubberlang *Richard Schiff *Patrick Warburton as Guy *Morgan Freeman as Patrick Meighan *Michael Dorn as Rick *Dennis Haysbert *Liam Neeson as Trix customer *Curtis Stigers *Sam J. Jones *John Slattery *David Hasselhoff as himself *Tom Brady as himself *Nana Visitor ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2015 comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about bears Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies directed by Seth MacFarlane
title: Ted 2
